Domestic Cleaning Services London

London House Cleaners is the #1 cleaning company in London and provides a wide range of cleaning services across London and inside the M25. We offer one-off deep cleans and specialised cleans or regular cleaning at weekly, biweekly, or monthly schedules. Our experienced and qualified team of cleaners is committed to delivering the best service to our customers.

How to Book Domestic Cleaners in London

Schedule Your Clean

Complete your details and cleaning preferences online or give us a call. We’ll handle the scheduling to fit your timetable.

Confirmation call

We’ll reach out to confirm your cleaning session, discuss your requirements, property details, and any additional services you might require.

Cleaning Day

Our professional cleaners arrive at your doorstep ready to clean your home. Sit back, relax, and enjoy your freshly cleaned home.

Choose a Cleaning Service in London

London House Cleaners offers a wide range of cleaning services for homes all over London. You can hire us for a one-time deep clean or regular maintenance. We can take care of all your cleaning needs. Customers in London choose us because we offer reliable and premium-quality cleaning services at competitive rates.

Domestic Cleaning

Our residential house cleaning service is the perfect solution for those looking to save time and get a cleaner home today, or on schedule. We offer cleaning of living areas in addition to routine dusting and vacuuming, we provide a healthier, cleaner home using eco-friendly and pet-safe products.

Our domestic service is ideal for busy Londoners looking for regular or one-off cleaning solutions.

End of Tenancy

Moving out? Our End of Tenancy Cleaning / Move-Out Cleaning ensures your London flat or house is spotless, helping secure your deposit return or just making sure the home is spotless for the next tenant. We meticulously clean every room, appliance, and surface to landlord and agency standards.

It’s also perfect for landlords aiming to attract new tenants with a pristine property.

Deep Cleaning Services

Our Deep Cleaning service is designed for homes needing more than the usual clean-up. We clean every corner, targeting grime and dirt buildup in kitchens, bathrooms, and living spaces.

Ideal for post-renovation cleans or annual spring cleaning, we use eco-friendly methods for a thorough refresh.

Specialised Cleaning

Opt for one of our more specialised cleaning services in London that can be added to your regular service or act as a stand alone service. These include: 

  • Emergency Cleaning or Same-Day Cleans

London Home Cleaning

You’re not alone if you’ve come home after a long day at work to find your house in complete disarray. With busy schedules and hectic lives, it’s nearly impossible to keep our homes clean and organised at all times. This is where our London home cleaning services come in to save the day.

London House Cleaners offers professional cleaners in London for all your household cleaning needs. Our cleaners are insured, background checked, and trained to use traditional and eco-friendly cleaning products to ensure a spotless and hygienic home.

We provide cleaning services in the following London areas:

  • Central London
  • North London
  • South London
  • East London
  • West London

Within these areas, we offer a variety of cleaning services to cater to your specific needs. From regular weekly or bi-weekly cleanings to one-time deep cleans and end-of-tenancy cleanings – our team is equipped and ready to tackle any mess.

So how can you trust us? Just check our satisfied customer reviews and ratings. Our loyal customers continue to rely on us for cleaning because we consistently deliver high-quality service.

But it’s not just about sparkling your home – our London home cleaning services also promote a healthier living environment for you and your family. By using eco-friendly products, we reduce the use of harmful chemicals in your home, making it safer for children and pets.

Our House Cleaning Services

So what can you expect from a house cleaning session with us? Our trained cleaners will thoroughly clean and disinfect your:

  • Kitchen: wiping down countertops, cleaning appliances, mopping floors, sanitizing sinks and faucets.
  • Bathrooms: scrubbing toilets, showers and tubs, polishing mirrors, washing floors.
  • Bedrooms: dusting furniture, making beds, vacuuming carpets.
  • Living areas: dusting surfaces, wiping down electronics, vacuuming or mopping floors.
  • Hallways and entryways: sweeping, dusting, and cleaning mirrors.

We also offer add-on services for an additional fee:

  • Laundry: we can wash, dry and fold your laundry during our visit.
  • Refrigerator/oven cleaning: we’ll deep clean these often neglected appliances to keep them in top working condition.
  • Window cleaning: we’ll clean your windows inside for a crystal clear view.

All of our services come at an hourly rate, so you only pay for the time needed to clean your home. We also offer fixed payments. However, this will depend on the size and condition of your home.

What Type of Results You Should Expect?

A clean home to one person may mean something completely different to another. That’s why we offer customisable cleaning plans to fit your specific needs and preferences. Our cleaners are trained to pay attention to detail and ensure that every nook and cranny is thoroughly cleaned.

If you require a comprehensive clean, we recommend scheduling a deep cleaning session. This will provide a more thorough and intense clean, perfect for those who are moving into a new home or want to refresh their living space.

Some of the benefits you can expect from our house cleaning services include:

  • A healthier living environment: Regular cleaning and disinfecting can help reduce allergens, bacteria, and other harmful substances in your home.
  • More free time: By outsourcing your cleaning tasks, you can focus on other important aspects of your life and enjoy more leisure time.
  • Peace of mind: Knowing that your home is being taken care of by professionals can bring a sense of calm and relaxation to your day-to-day routine.
  • A sparkling clean home: There’s nothing quite like coming home to a freshly cleaned and tidy home. It can elevate your mood and make you feel more relaxed and at ease.
  • Increased productivity: Studies have shown that a clean and organised environment can lead to increased productivity and focus. By keeping your home clean, you may also find yourself feeling more motivated and productive in other areas of your life.

So what are you waiting for? Let our professional cleaners take care of your home and enjoy the many benefits of a clean living space. Contact us today to schedule your first cleaning session!

Any Questions?

Frequently Asked Questions About Our Services

It depends entirely on the size of your house! The minimum booking length is 3 hours, but you can always request a longer booking if you need one. Depending on the number of bedrooms and bathrooms you have, our checkout process will automatically scale your booking to the recommended amount of time for a home of your size.

This depends on the size of your house — enter how many bedrooms and bathrooms you have into the form above and we’ll give you an instant quote. We’re confident you’ll find prices extremely reasonable given the high level of service you will receive from your pro.

Some cleaning plans require a minimum commitment term. Cancelling your plan before the minimum term is complete will result in a $99 fee. If you want to learn more information about how to cancel, please inbox us.

If you have a washing machine and/or dryer in your home, your professional can absolutely wash and fold your laundry for you! Be sure to add it as an extra during the checkout process so the professional can be sure to set aside enough time to clean your home and still have time for laundry (it will add an extra hour onto your booking).
